name: PWA install prompt is available
summary: A user visiting Conclave in a supported browser can install it as a PWA.
given: The user navigates to Conclave in Chrome or another PWA-capable browser.
when: The browser evaluates PWA installability criteria against the served manifest and service worker
then: The manifest is served with a 192x192 and 512x512 icon entry
A service worker with a fetch handler is registered
The browser offers the install prompt
edgeCases: Compiled binary mode: manifest.json and icon.svg are embedded and served correctly
Development mode: manifest.json and icon.svg are served from dist/
